original_text: And he struck them hip and thigh with a great blow, and he went down and stayed in the cleft of the rock of Etam.
korean_text: 블레셋 사람들의 정강이와 넓적다리를 크게 쳐서 죽이고 내려가서 에담 바위 틈에 머물렀더라

sentences.original_text: And he struck them hip and thigh with a great blow
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그들을 큰 일격으로 허벅지와 엉덩이를 쳤고

sentences.original_text: and stayed in the cleft of the rock of Etam
